explanation: [0-0] The video begins at the top of a water slide, showing a tray filled with colorful water balloons at the top of the slide. The side of the slide is blue.
[0-2] The tray at the top of the slide falls, and all the water balloons in the tray fall into the slide, and the water flows down the slide wall.
